p:
In the third model specification we modeled individual variability of transmission rates. We did that by multiplying the constant transmission rate λ (as in the first model specification) with a log-normal variable Z
i for each i individual (node) with location parameter − σ 2/2 and scale σ in order to preserve the mean of λ (i.e. E( λ
i ) = λ since E( Z
i ) = 1).
